data.text: Ezɨ overiamɨn pɨn bizir bar igharagha garim oto. Amizir mam, an aruemɨn angazangarim korotiamɨn mɨn aneru, ezɨ iakɨnim an suemningɨn apengan iti, ezɨ dapanir asuar mɨkovezir 12pla itim, an dapanimɨn iti.
12:2 Aisaia 66:7; Galesia 4:19Amizir kam navim asegha borim batasava amua mɨzazim isava arai.
Ezɨ overiamɨn bizir igharagha garir igharazim oto, maburan kuruzir aghevir mam, a dapanir 7pla ikia, egha 10plan komba ikia, egha 7plan atrivimɨn dapanir asuaba vaghavagha an dapanibar iti.

12:4 Daniel 8:10; Akar Mogomem 9:10; 17:8Kuruzir kam overiamɨn itir mɨkoveziba 3plan okoruabar da tuira, egha okoruar mam pamtem uan ipemɨn dar vigha da makunizɨma da iza nguazim gire. Kuruzim ghaze, amizim borim bateghtɨma an anemasa, kamaghɨn kuruzim amizimɨn guamɨn tughav iti.

12:5 Onger Akaba 2:9; Aisaia 7:14; 66:7; Akar Mogomem 2:27; 19:15Ezɨ amizim otarim bate, otarir God mɨsevezim, a ainɨn aghorir gavgavimɨn suiraghɨva gumazamiziba mɨghvɨra me gativagham. Ezɨ an otarim me zuamɨra a inigha Godɨn atrivir dabirabimɨn anefasava a inigha ghuavanabo.
12:6 Akar Mogomem 11:2-3; 12:4Ezɨ amizir kam ara gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ghu. Danganir kam God a bagha anekɨri, eghtɨ a kagh 1,260plan dughiabar ikɨ akurvazim ini ikiam.

12:7 Daniel 10:13; 10:21; 12:1; Jut 1:9; Akar Mogomem 20:2Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn maburan mɨdorozim Godɨn Nguibamɨn pɨn oto. Maikel uan enselba ko kuruzir kam mɨsosi, ezɨ kuruzir ekiam uan enselba ko men mɨdorozim ikarvasi.
Egha kuruzir kam gavgaviba puvatɨgha Godɨn Nguibamɨn uan danganim ataki.

12:9 Jenesis 3:1; 3:4; 3:14; Luk 10:18; 22:31; Jon 12:31; Akar Mogomem 9:1; 20:2-3Ezɨ Maikelɨn enselba kuruzir ekiam akunizɨ a izaghira irɨ. Kar kuruzir fomɨra itim, me Satan a garɨsi egha uaghan an ziar mam, “Gumazir Akam Gumazamizibagh asim.” A gumazir nguazimɨn itir gumazamizibagh ifarim, a datɨrɨghɨn uan enselba ko iza nguazim girɨ.
Ezɨ kɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn tiarir ekiar mam barazi a kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Kraisɨn adarasi, dughiar gumazamiziba me mɨsozima me ariaghirim,
Kamagh amizɨ, ia Godɨn Nguibam ko an itir darazi bar,
Ezɨ kuruzim fo, me anekunizɨ a nguazimɨn iraghu, egha amizir otarim batezir kamɨn agɨra.

12:14 Daniel 7:25; 12:7; Akar Mogomem 12:6; 17:3God kamaghsua, amizim azenir 3pla ko akuamɨn gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikɨva, egh a kagh akurvazim iniam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a mɨghegh danganir God a bagha dɨkɨrɨzir kamɨn mangasa, God kuarazir anebar ekiamɨn avɨzimning a ganɨngi.
12:15 Aisaia 59:19Kuruzim kamaghsua, aperiar ekiam amizim inigh mangɨgham. Egha kamaghɨn uan akamɨn dɨpar ekiamɨn miki, ezɨ dɨpar kam aperiar ekiamɨn mɨn ivegha amizimɨn gɨn zui.
Ezɨ nguazim amizimɨn akurvagha, akam akarigha dɨpar kuruzim mighizir kam tui.

12:17 Jenesis 3:15; 1 Jon 5:10; Akar Mogomem 11:7; 13:7; 14:12; 20:4Kamagh amizɨ, kuruzim puvɨram amizim atara ghua an borir igharaziba ko mɨsoghasa, kar Godɨn Akar Gavgavibar gɨn zuir darazi ko Iesusɨn akamɨn gun mɨgeiba.
Egha kuruzim ongarir dadarimɨn tughav iti.
